rows.label: campfev11_590_100_msg0001
rows.name:
So, Metsu made off with the seal
after all...

rows.label: campfev11_590_100_msg0002
rows.name: If only I could have used my power...

rows.label: campfev11_590_100_msg0003
rows.name:
If you had, you'd have wiped out
half the population.

rows.label: campfev11_590_100_msg0006
rows.name:
I hate to say it, but that bastard
was just better than us.

rows.label: campfev11_590_100_msg0007
rows.name:
Luckily, for whatever reason, he's seen
fit to give us a bit more time.

rows.label: campfev11_590_100_msg0008
rows.name:
It's up to us to use that time
to do whatever we can.

rows.label: campfev11_590_100_msg0010
rows.name:
Though the going will doubtless
be tough, we have no choice but
to press on.

rows.label: campfev11_590_100_msg0012
rows.name:
Let's get Shin to make us a nice
big dinner

rows.label: campfev11_590_100_msg0013
rows.name:
I'm not quite in the mood to party,
but some food does sound nice.

rows.label: campfev11_590_100_msg0014
rows.name:
First, we need to report to the king.
Everything else comes after.
